# AnimationDefinition

**Protocol**

The configuration, including target object, timeframe, and visual semantics, of an animation.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AnimationDefinition
```

## Overview

The framework adopts this protocol for several concrete animation objects, such as [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/FromToByAnimation], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SampledAnimation], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/OrbitAnimation], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeAnimation], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationView], and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationGroup].

## Configuring the animation

- **name**: A textual name for the animation.
- **bindTarget**: A textual name that identifies the particular property that animates.
- **blendLayer**: The order in which the framework composites the animation.

## Timing the animation

- **speed**: A factor that increases or decreases the animation’s rate of playback.
- **delay**: An amount of time that elapses before the animation plays.
- **duration**: The total playback time of the animation.
- **offset**: The time, in seconds, at which the animation begins within the duration.
- **trimDuration**: An optional duration that overrides the source animation’s duration.
- **trimStart**: The time, in seconds, at which the animation plays.
- **trimEnd**: The time, in seconds, at which the source animation stops.
- **trimmed(start:end:duration:)**: Edits the animation duration according to the specified time.

## Repeating animation playback

- **repeatMode**: An option that determines how the animation repeats.
- **fillMode**: An option that determines which data displays outside of the normal duration.
- **repeated(count:)**: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by an irrational number.
- **repeated(count:)**: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by a whole number.
- **repeatingForever()**: Repeats the animation infinitely.

## Instance Methods

- **repeated(count:)**: Repeats an animation the number of times specified by a whole number.

## Animation definitions

- **SampledAnimation**: An animation that cycles through a series of frames at a constant interval.
- **TweenMode**: Options that determine whether an animation switches between frames gradually or abruptly.
- **FromToByAnimation**: An animation that starts, stops, or increments by a specific value.
- **AnimationTimingFunction**: The pacing of an animation transition.
- **AnimationView**: An animation that represents a variation of another animation.
- **OrbitAnimation**: An animation that revolves an entity around its origin.
- **AnimationFillMode**: Options that determine which animation frames display outside of the normal duration.
- **AnimationGroup**: A collection of animations that play simultaneously.
- **AnimationHandoffType**: The type of handoff the play animation method performs between a current animation and a new animation.

## Conforming Types

- ActionAnimation
- AnimationGroup
- AnimationView
- BlendTreeAnimation
- FromToByAnimation
- OrbitAnimation
- SampledAnimation
